title: Pantheon Needs A Nerf On His E
body: With ThunderLord's Decree he can literally make anyone half health with we combo. I've been on both ends, was pantheon against irelia and my we combo alone got irelia to almost half health so basically 2 we combo can kill irelia. A few games later I was playing tristana bot lane and pantheon (enemy) had 1 kill on our riven he ulted and we backed off but he flashed WE combo me and I died instantly. I think rito needs to do something about this.

Seriously, Panth is trash atm, i play him 'cause I love him since the first day but, to sum up:
The moment you dont have the lead, you are trash, as you will get fked if behind as they enemy will have more dmg/tankyness, his E can be stopped, if he wants to W someone he has to go in between all your team, with no escaping options, burns mana quite fast, his ult is impossible to land unless you are blind {{champion:64}} and early on his CD's are high (but Q but that's all)
